class.name: chainable_controllers_demo/RigidPoseBroadcaster
class.description: Publishes a simple dummy pose (pose.x, pose.y, pose.theta) as reference interfaces for other controllers in the chain.

class.name: chainable_controllers_demo/BroydenController
class.description: Exports velocity references (vel.v, vel.w) and subscribes to /kalman_estimate for closed-loop Broyden update logic.

class.name: chainable_controllers_demo/KalmanController
class.description: Fuses chained pose and velocity references, publishing a fused geometry_msgs::msg::Pose on /kalman_estimate. Does not command hardware.
